articles.content: Tomato flu or tomato fever can give red-coloured skin rash or blisters on the skin. (PHoto: Linkedin)

articles.title: 25 dead as heavy monsoon rains inflict chaos in Himachal, Uttarakhand; Odisha, Jharkhand also hit - The Tribune India
articles.description: At least 25 people were killed in the hilly regions of the north and in the plains of the east as monsoon rains triggered flashfloods, landslides, and house collapses, upending normal life across large swathes of the country.
